entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as radiating happiness and contentment. He is also described as nodding enthusiastically and having a broad smile on his face.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking at Dumbledore with questions and concerns. He is also mentioned as letting Voldemort kill him.

relationships.description: Dumbledore encourages Harry to continue talking about his soul.
Voldemort used the Killing Curse on Harry.
